item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Simon Pegg
item.description: "Ultimately, we are all products of the experiences we have and the decisions we make as children, and it remains a peculiar detail of human condition that something as precious as the future is entrusted to us when we possess so little foresight. Perhaps that's what makes hindsight so intriguing. When you're young the future is a blank canvas, but looking back you are always able to see the big picture." -- Simon Pegg

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "The greatest fools are ofttimes more clever than the men who laugh at them." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "Even the bravest men fear death and maiming" -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "There are other ways to tempt men, besides the flesh." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Saying 'I notice you're a nerd' is like saying, 'Hey, I notice that you'd rather be intelligent than be stupid, that you'd rather be thoughtful than be vapid, that you believe that there are things that matter more than the arrest record of Lindsay Lohan. Why is that?' In fact, it seems to me that most contemporary insults are pretty lame. Even 'lame' is kind of lame. Saying 'You're lame' is like saying 'You walk with a limp.' Yeah, whatever, so does 50 Cent, and he's done all right for himself." -- John Green

item.title: Alejandro add a quote by Simon Pegg
item.description: "Being a geek is all about being honest about what you enjoy and not being afraid to demonstrate that affection. It means never having to play it cool about how much you like something. Itâ€™s basically a license to proudly emote on a somewhat childish level rather than behave like a supposed adult. Being a geek is extremely liberating." -- Simon Pegg
